overview: This Stereophonics documentary goes well beyond the usual run-of-the-mill profile of a rock band. It's a comprehensive look deep into the history of the group from their earliest days on through their chart-topping success. Legendary figures such as Bono, Paul Weller, and Noel Gallagher are just a few of the people interviewed about this iconic band's rise to the top. In addition to this stellar documentary are over two hours of live performances including rare footage
title: Stereophonics: Rewind
